channel.title: power on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in power on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Introduction to the Indian Caste System
How to encourage mutual respect between men and women in India
item.description: INTRODUCTION The gang-rape and death of Jyothi Singh Pandey who was previously known in the media as Damini or Nirbhaya, was the tipping point in bringing to focus a long suffered issue of disrespect and violence towards women in India.

item.title: LOG 1.14: A Trip to GÃ¶ttingen
item.description: 10th April, 2011 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ I just returned from a trip to GÃ¶ttingen where my flatmates and I celebrated an old flatmateâ€™s birthday. We took a train yesterday morning and I was quite taken in by the beauty of the countryside.

item.title: Frames of Reference
item.description: A colleague of mine is taking German lessons and when the topic of poetry came up at lunch, he described Elftans, and their structure. It reminded me a little of Haiku so I said Â¨Sounds like the European version of HaikuÂ¨.

item.title: Written in the moonlight
item.description: From May 2008 For too long I have absorbed. Here in this moonlight. I still see colour. I breathe. I create. There is no romantic breeze

item.title: On a Modified Version of Democracy
item.description: From May 2008 Those of my regular readers in Karnataka will know about the elections held recently. This being my first opportunity to exercise my vote, I thought about it a great deal.

item.title: Arranged Marriage
item.description: Arranged marriage is an old concept. It existed long before people accepted love (that occurred before marriage) as a valid reason to marry. The process through which this changed is reflected very well in the movie â€˜Fiddler on the Roofâ€™.
